carta.name: Divine Arsenal AA-ZEUS - Sky Thunder
carta.desc:
2 Level 12 monsters
Once per turn, if an Xyz Monster battled this turn, you can also Xyz Summon "Divine Arsenal AA-ZEUS - Sky Thunder" by using 1 Xyz Monster you control as material. (Transfer its materials to this card.) (Quick Effect): You can detach 2 materials from this card; send all other cards from the field to the GY. Once per turn, if another card(s) you control is destroyed by battle or an opponent's card effect: You can attach 1 card from your hand, Deck, or Extra Deck to this card as material.

carta.name: Ghost Ogre & Snow Rabbit
carta.desc: When a monster on the field activates its effect, or when a Spell/Trap that is already face-up on the field activates its effect (Quick Effect): You can send this card from your hand or field to the GY; destroy that card on the field. You can only use this effect of "Ghost Ogre & Snow Rabbit" once per turn.

carta.name: Princess Curran
carta.desc: This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. This card cannot be Special Summoned except with "Trial of the Princesses". During your Standby Phase, inflict 600 damage to your opponent for each monster they control.

carta.name: Cold Enchanter
carta.desc: You can discard 1 card to target 1 face-up monster on the field; place an Ice Counter on that target. This card gains 300 ATK for each Ice Counter on the field.

carta.name: Piri Reis Map
carta.desc: At the start of your Main Phase 1: Add 1 monster with 0 ATK from your Deck to your hand, but halve your LP. After adding it to your hand, until the end of the next turn after this card was activated, you cannot activate the added monster's effects, or the effects of cards with its name, until you Normal Summon that monster or a card with its name.

carta.name: Princess Cologne
carta.desc:
2 Level 4 monsters
When this card is Xyz Summoned: You can target 1 "Box of Friends" in your Graveyard; Special Summon that target. If you control another monster, your opponent cannot target this card with cards, effects, or for attacks. If a face-up Normal Monster(s) you control is destroyed by battle or by card effect and sent to the Graveyard: You can detach 1 Xyz Material from this card; Special Summon 1 Normal Monster from your Deck or Graveyard in face-up Defense Position.

carta.name: Raidraptor - Stranger Falcon
carta.desc:
2 Level 5 monsters
If this card has an Xyz Monster as Xyz Material, it gains this effect.
● Once per turn: You can detach 1 Xyz Material from this card, then target 1 monster your opponent controls; destroy it, and if you do, inflict damage to your opponent equal its original ATK.
If this card in your possession is destroyed by your opponent's card (by battle or card effect) and sent to your Graveyard: You can target 1 "Raidraptor" Xyz Monster in your Graveyard, except "Raidraptor - Stranger Falcon"; Special Summon it, and if you do, attach this card to it as Xyz Material.

carta.name: Poison Mummy
carta.desc: FLIP: Inflict 500 damage to your opponent.

carta.name: Griffore
carta.desc: This monster's tough hide deflects almost any attack.

carta.name: Scrap Golem
carta.desc: Once per turn: You can target 1 Level 4 or lower "Scrap" monster in your GY; Special Summon that target to either player's field.

carta.name: Gladiator Beast's Battle Archfiend Shield
carta.desc: Equip only to a "Gladiator Beast" monster. If the equipped monster would be destroyed, destroy this card instead. When this card is sent to your Graveyard because the equipped monster you controlled was shuffled into your Deck: Return this card to your hand.

carta.name: Number C40: Gimmick Puppet of Dark Strings
carta.desc:
3 Level 9 monsters
When this card is Special Summoned: Destroy the monsters with String Counters, and if you do, draw 1 card, then inflict damage to your opponent equal to the highest original ATK among those destroyed monsters in the Graveyard (your choice, if tied). Once per turn: You can detach 1 Xyz Material from this card; place 1 String Counter on each face-up monster your opponent controls.

carta.name: Tengu, the Winged Mayakashi
carta.desc:
1 Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner monsters / You can only control 1 "Tengu, the Winged Mayakashi". You can only use each of these effects of "Tengu, the Winged Mayakashi" once per turn.
● If a Synchro Monster in your possession whose original Level is 9 is destroyed by battle or an opponent's card effect while this card is in the GY: You can banish 1 other Zombie monster from your GY, and if you do, Special Summon this card.
● If this card is Special Summoned from the GY: You can destroy 1 Spell/Trap your opponent controls.

carta.name: Pulling the Rug
carta.desc: Negate the activation and effect of an Effect Monster whose effect activated when a monster was Normal Summoned (even itself), and destroy that Effect Monster.

carta.name: Dark Advance
carta.desc: During either player's Main Phase or Battle Phase: Target 1 monster in your Graveyard with 2400 or more ATK and 1000 DEF; add it to your hand, then immediately after this effect resolves, you can Tribute Summon 1 monster with 2400 or more ATK and 1000 DEF in face-up Attack Position. You can only activate 1 "Dark Advance" per turn.

carta.name: Dark Scheme
carta.desc: Your opponent can discard 1 card to negate this card's effect, otherwise both players discard 2 cards, then draw 2 cards.

carta.name: Energy-Absorbing Monolith
carta.desc: Chain this card to an opponent's card effect that would inflict damage to you. That damage is negated, and you gain Life Points equal to the amount you would have taken.

carta.name: Bending Destiny
carta.desc: Activate only if all face-up monsters you control are "Fortune Lady" monsters. Negate the activation of a Spell or Trap Card, or the Normal Summon of a monster, and remove that card from play. The card removed from play by this effect is returned to its owner's hand during the End Phase.

carta.name: Zefra Divine Strike
carta.desc: When a Spell/Trap Card, or monster effect, is activated: Banish 1 face-up "Zefra" monster in your Extra Deck; negate the activation, and if you do, destroy it.

carta.name: Naturia Sacred Tree
carta.desc:
If this card is sent to the Graveyard: Add 1 "Naturia" card from your Deck to your hand, except "Naturia Sacred Tree". You can only use 1 of the following effects of "Naturia Sacred Tree" per turn, and only once that turn.
● You can Tribute 1 EARTH Insect-Type monster; Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower EARTH Plant-Type monster from your Deck.
● You can Tribute 1 EARTH Plant-Type monster; Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower EARTH Insect-Type monster from your Deck.

carta.name: Synchro Ejection
carta.desc: Select 1 face-up Synchro Monster your opponent controls and remove it from play. Then, your opponent draws 1 card.

carta.name: Different Dimension Encounter
carta.desc: If both players have at least 1 banished monster that can be Special Summoned: Each player Special Summons 1 of their banished monsters in face-down Defense Position.

carta.name: Fire King Combined Strike
carta.desc: Special Summon 1 FIRE Beast, 1 FIRE Beast-Warrior, and 1 FIRE Winged Beast monster (1 each from your hand, Deck, and GY), but negate their effects, also destroy them during the End Phase. You can banish this card from your GY; this turn, your opponent cannot activate cards or effects when your "Fire King" monster(s) is Normal or Special Summoned. You can only use each effect of "Fire King Combined Strike" once per turn.

carta.name: Royal Decree
carta.desc: Negate all other Trap effects on the field.

carta.name: Tyrant's Tirade
carta.desc: Tribute 2 monsters. Effects of Effect Monsters that activate in the hand or on the field cannot be activated.

carta.name: Dark Contract with the Witch
carta.desc: You can send 1 "D/D" or "Dark Contract" card from your hand to the Graveyard, then target 1 card on the field; destroy it. You can only use this effect of "Dark Contract with the Witch" once per turn. All Fiend-Type monsters you control gain 1000 ATK during your opponent's turn only. Once per turn, during your Standby Phase: Take 1000 damage.

carta.name: Battleguard Rage
carta.desc: Activate this card by targeting 1 Warrior-Type monster you control; it gains 1000 ATK. Monsters destroyed by battle with it are returned to the hand instead of going to the Graveyard. When that monster leaves the field, destroy this card.

carta.name: Link Restart
carta.desc: When a Spell/Trap Card, or monster effect, is activated that would inflict damage to you: Negate the activation, and if you do, Special Summon 1 Link Monster from your GY.

carta.name: Ordeal of a Traveler
carta.desc: When an opponent's monster declares an attack: Your opponent chooses 1 random card in your hand and calls the type of the card (Monster, Spell, or Trap), and if they call it wrong, return the attacking monster to the hand.

carta.name: Brain Hazard
carta.desc: Select 1 of your removed from play Psychic-Type monsters, and Special Summon it. When this card is removed from the field, destroy that monster. When that monster is destroyed, destroy this card.

carta.name: Shiranui Style Swallow's Slash
carta.desc: Tribute 1 Zombie-Type monster, then target 2 cards on the field; destroy them, then banish 1 "Shiranui" monster from your Deck. You can only activate 1 "Shiranui Style Swallow's Slash" per turn.

carta.name: Earth Golem @Ignister
carta.desc:
1 Cyberse monster + 1 Link Monster
After this card is Fusion Summoned, you take no damage for the rest of this turn. If this card attacks a monster that was Special Summoned from the Extra Deck, this card gains ATK equal to its original ATK during the Damage Step only. When this card is destroyed by battle: You can target 1 Cyberse monster in your GY, except "Earth Golem @Ignister"; Special Summon it. You can only use this effect of "Earth Golem @Ignister" once per turn.

carta.name: The Phantom Knights' Rank-Up-Magic Launch
carta.desc: During the Main Phase: Target 1 DARK Xyz Monster you control with no material; Special Summon from your Extra Deck, 1 DARK Xyz Monster that is 1 Rank higher than that monster you control, by using it as the Xyz Material, and if you do, attach this card to it as additional material. (This is treated as an Xyz Summon. Transfer its materials to the Summoned monster.) During your Main Phase: You can banish this card from your GY, then target 1 DARK Xyz Monster you control; attach 1 "The Phantom Knights" monster from your hand to that monster as material.

carta.name: Stall Turn
carta.desc: When a Spell/Trap Card, or monster effect, is activated that negates the Summon OR the activation of a Spell/Trap Card: Banish 3 cards from the top of your Deck, face-down; negate the activation, and if you do, shuffle that card into the Deck.

carta.name: Demigod of the Tistina
carta.desc: If you control a "Tistina" card: You can Special Summon this card from your hand, then you can add 1 "Tistina" Spell/Trap from your Deck to your hand. During your opponent's turn, if you control "Crystal God Tistina" (Quick Effect): You can change as many monsters your opponent controls as possible to face-down Defense Position, then you can send all face-up cards your opponent controls to the GY. You can only use each effect of "Demigod of the Tistina" once per turn.

carta.name: Court of Cards
carta.desc: If you control no monsters, or only control "Queen's Knight", "King's Knight", and/or "Jack's Knight": You can Special Summon 1 "Queen's Knight", "King's Knight", or "Jack's Knight" from your hand or GY. You can banish up to 1 each "Queen's Knight", "King's Knight", and/or "Jack's Knight" from your hand and/or GY; draw the same number of cards you banished. You can only use 1 "Court of Cards" effect per turn, and only once that turn.

carta.name: Life Extreme
carta.desc: Equip only to an EARTH Synchro Monster. If the equipped monster battles an opponent's monster, the opponent's monster loses 1500 ATK during that damage calculation only. Once per turn, if a monster's battle position is changed (except during the Damage Step): You can target 1 card on the field; destroy it. If this card is sent from the Spell & Trap Zone to the GY: You can Tribute 1 "Power Tool" Synchro Monster; Special Summon 1 "Life Stream Dragon" from your Extra Deck. (This is treated as a Synchro Summon.)

carta.name: Allure of Darkness
carta.desc: Draw 2 cards, then banish 1 DARK monster from your hand, or, if you do not have any in your hand, send your entire hand to the GY.

carta.name: Fulfillment of the Contract
carta.desc: Activate this card by paying 800 LP, then target 1 Ritual Monster in your GY; Special Summon it and equip it with this card. When this card is destroyed, banish the equipped monster.

carta.name: Nightmare Archfiends
carta.desc: Tribute 1 monster; Special Summon 3 "Nightmare Archfiend Tokens" (Fiend-Type/DARK/Level 6/ATK 2000/DEF 2000) to your opponent's field in Attack Position. Each time 1 is destroyed, its controller takes 800 damage.

carta.name: Inzektor Axe - Zektahawk
carta.desc: Equip only to an "Inzektor" monster. It gains 1000 ATK. When the equipped monster declares an attack, your opponent cannot activate Spell/Trap Cards.

carta.name: Zekt Conversion
carta.desc: When a face-up "Inzektor" monster you control is targeted for an attack: Target the attacking monster; equip the attack target to that attacking monster. Take control of the equipped monster while it is equipped with an "Inzektor" monster by this effect.

carta.name: Crystal Keeper
carta.desc:
[ Pendulum Effect ] 
Each turn, the first time an "Ultimate Crystal" monster(s) and/or "Crystal Beast" card(s) you control would be destroyed by card effect that turn, it is not destroyed.
[ Monster Effect ] 
If a "Crystal Beast" monster you control battles an opponent's monster, during damage calculation (Quick Effect): You can Tribute this card from your hand or face-up field; your battling monster's ATK/DEF become double its original ATK/DEF during that damage calculation only, but it is destroyed at the end of this Damage Step.

carta.name: Comic Hand
carta.desc: If you control "Toon World", equip to an opponent's monster. Take control of it. It is treated as a Toon monster. If your opponent controls no Toon monsters, it can attack your opponent directly. If "Toon World" is not on the field, destroy this card.

carta.name: Amarylease
carta.desc: During your Main Phase: You can banish this card from your Graveyard; you can Normal Summon 1 monster this turn for 1 less Tribute. You can only use the effect of "Amarylease" once per turn.

carta.name: CXyz Coach Lord Ultimatrainer
carta.desc:
4 Level 9 monsters
This card cannot be targeted by card effects. If this card has an Xyz Monster as an Xyz Material, it gains this effect.
● Once per turn: You can detach 1 Xyz Material from this card; draw 1 card and reveal it, then if it was a monster, inflict 800 damage to your opponent.

carta.name: Heavy Mech Support Platform
carta.desc: Once per turn, you can either: Target 1 Machine monster you control; equip this card to that target, OR: Unequip this card and Special Summon it. A monster equipped with this card gains 500 ATK/DEF, also if the equipped monster would be destroyed by battle or card effect, destroy this card instead.

carta.name: Cranium Fish
carta.desc: You can Special Summon this card by Tributing 1 "Ocean's Keeper". You can discard 1 WATER monster to the Graveyard to destroy 1 face-down card.

carta.name: Cyberse Gadget
carta.desc: When this card is Normal Summoned: You can target 1 Level 2 or lower monster in your GY; Special Summon it in Defense Position, but its effects are negated. If this card is sent from the field to the GY: You can Special Summon 1 "Gadget Token" (Cyberse/LIGHT/Level 2/ATK 0/DEF 0). You can only use this effect of "Cyberse Gadget" once per turn.

carta.name: Widespread Ruin
carta.desc: When an opponent's monster declares an attack: Destroy the Attack Position monster your opponent controls with the highest ATK (your choice, if tied).

carta.name: Telekinetic Charging Cell
carta.desc: Equip only to a Psychic-Type monster. You do not have to pay Life Points to activate its effect(s). When the equipped monster is destroyed and this card is sent to the Graveyard, you can pay 1000 Life Points to return this card to your hand.

carta.name: Favorite Hero
carta.desc: Equip only to a Level 5 or higher "HERO" monster. If you control a card in your Field Zone, the equipped monster gains ATK equal to its original DEF, also your opponent cannot target it with card effects. At the start of the Battle Phase: You can activate 1 Field Spell directly from your hand or Deck. You can only use this effect of "Favorite Hero" once per turn. When the equipped monster attacks and destroys an opponent's monster by battle: You can send this card to the GY; the attacking monster can make a second attack in a row.

carta.name: Discord
carta.desc: Neither player can Synchro Summon. Send this card to the Graveyard during your 3rd End Phase after activation.

carta.name: Mirror Force
carta.desc: When an opponent's monster declares an attack: Destroy all your opponent's Attack Position monsters.

carta.name: Card of Demise
carta.desc: Draw until you have 3 cards in your hand, also for the rest of this turn after this card resolves, your opponent takes no damage. During the End Phase of this turn, send your entire hand to the GY. You can only activate 1 "Card of Demise" per turn. You cannot Special Summon during the turn you activate this card.

carta.name: Gust Fan
carta.desc: A WIND monster equipped with this card increases its ATK by 400 points and decreases its DEF by 200 points.

carta.name: Sea Kamen
carta.desc: A merciless monster that tears opponents to shreds with razor-like claws.

carta.name: Destructive Daruma Karma Cannon
carta.desc: Change as many monsters on the field as possible to face-down Defense Position, then, if either player controls a face-up monster(s), they must send all face-up monsters they control to the GY.

carta.name: Divine Arsenal AA-ZEUS - Sky Thunder
carta.desc:
2 Level 12 monsters
Once per turn, if an Xyz Monster battled this turn, you can also Xyz Summon "Divine Arsenal AA-ZEUS - Sky Thunder" by using 1 Xyz Monster you control as material. (Transfer its materials to this card.) (Quick Effect): You can detach 2 materials from this card; send all other cards from the field to the GY. Once per turn, if another card(s) you control is destroyed by battle or an opponent's card effect: You can attach 1 card from your hand, Deck, or Extra Deck to this card as material.

carta.name: Princess Curran
carta.desc: This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. This card cannot be Special Summoned except with "Trial of the Princesses". During your Standby Phase, inflict 600 damage to your opponent for each monster they control.

● If a Synchro Monster in your possession whose original Level is 9 is destroyed by battle or an opponent's card effect while this card is in the GY: You can banish 1 other Zombie monster from your GY, and if you do, Special Summon this card.
● If this card is Special Summoned from the GY: You can destroy 1 Spell/Trap your opponent controls.

Once per turn: You can detach 1 Xyz Material from this card; place 1 String Counter on each face-up monster your opponent controls.

carta.desc: Draw until you have 3 cards in your hand, also for the rest of this turn after this card resolves, your opponent takes no damage. During the End Phase of this turn, send your entire hand to the GY. You can only activate 1 "Card of Demise" per turn. You cannot Special Summon during the turn you activate this card.
